attributes.action: make it mandatory that, if any MP changes his/her party, then a by-election must be called to enable the electorate to choose the MP for that constituency.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently MP's can be voted into office under the banner and manifesto of one party and then change their allegiances without having to stand down so that a by-election can be called. This is not fair on the electorate so if an MP 'crosses the house' then it should be mandatory that a by-election is called.
